binding2.original_line: bindsym $mod+d exec --no-startup-id "command -v rofi > /dev/null && rofi -show drun -show-icons || dmenu_run"

system_conflicts.description: 'Print' conflicts with system shortcut for System screenshot

ergonomic_issues.description: '$mod+Shift+1' is ergonomically difficult: Shift+number keys are error-prone
'$mod+Shift+2' is ergonomically difficult: Shift+number keys are error-prone
'$mod+Shift+3' is ergonomically difficult: Shift+number keys are error-prone
'$mod+Shift+4' is ergonomically difficult: Shift+number keys are error-prone
'$mod+Shift+5' is ergonomically difficult: Shift+number keys are error-prone
'$mod+Shift+6' is ergonomically difficult: Shift+number keys are error-prone
'$mod+Shift+7' is ergonomically difficult: Shift+number keys are error-prone
'$mod+Shift+8' is ergonomically difficult: Shift+number keys are error-prone
'$mod+Shift+9' is ergonomically difficult: Shift+number keys are error-prone
'$mod+Shift+0' is ergonomically difficult: Shift+number keys are error-prone
'Ctrl+Shift+Print' is ergonomically difficult: Requires hand stretching

bindings.original_line: bindsym $mod+Ctrl+1 move container to workspace $ws1; workspace $ws1
bindsym $mod+Ctrl+2 move container to workspace $ws2; workspace $ws2
bindsym $mod+Ctrl+3 move container to workspace $ws3; workspace $ws3
bindsym $mod+Ctrl+4 move container to workspace $ws4; workspace $ws4
bindsym $mod+Ctrl+5 move container to workspace $ws5; workspace $ws5
bindsym $mod+Ctrl+6 move container to workspace $ws6; workspace $ws6
bindsym $mod+Ctrl+7 move container to workspace $ws7; workspace $ws7
bindsym $mod+Ctrl+8 move container to workspace $ws8; workspace $ws8
bindsym $mod+Ctrl+9 move container to workspace $ws9; workspace $ws9
bindsym $mod+Ctrl+0 move container to workspace $ws10; workspace $ws10

bindings.command: exec --no-startup-id i3-msg 'exec warp-terminal-preview || i3-sensible-terminal; [class=".*"] move scratchpad'
bindings.original_line: bindsym $mod+Shift+Return exec --no-startup-id i3-msg 'exec warp-terminal-preview || i3-sensible-terminal; [class=".*"] move scratchpad'
bindsym $mod+d exec --no-startup-id "command -v rofi > /dev/null && rofi -show drun -show-icons || dmenu_run"

bindings.command: exec "command -v thunar > /dev/null && thunar || command -v nautilus > /dev/null && nautilus || command -v pcmanfm > /dev/null && pcmanfm || xdg-open ~"
bindings.original_line: bindsym $mod+Shift+f exec "command -v thunar > /dev/null && thunar || command -v nautilus > /dev/null && nautilus || command -v pcmanfm > /dev/null && pcmanfm || xdg-open ~"
bindsym XF86AudioMute exec --no-startup-id pactl set-sink-mute @DEFAULT_SINK@ toggle && $refresh_i3status
bindsym XF86AudioMicMute exec --no-startup-id pactl set-source-mute @DEFAULT_SOURCE@ toggle && $refresh_i3status

bindings.command: resize shrink width 5 px or 5 ppt
bindings.original_line: bindsym h resize shrink width 5 px or 5 ppt

bindings.command: resize grow height 5 px or 5 ppt
bindings.original_line: bindsym j resize grow height 5 px or 5 ppt

bindings.command: resize shrink height 5 px or 5 ppt
bindings.original_line: bindsym k resize shrink height 5 px or 5 ppt

bindings.command: resize grow width 5 px or 5 ppt
bindings.original_line: bindsym l resize grow width 5 px or 5 ppt

bindings.command: resize shrink width 10 px or 10 ppt
bindings.original_line: bindsym Left resize shrink width 10 px or 10 ppt

bindings.command: resize grow height 10 px or 10 ppt
bindings.original_line: bindsym Down resize grow height 10 px or 10 ppt

bindings.command: resize shrink height 10 px or 10 ppt
bindings.original_line: bindsym Up resize shrink height 10 px or 10 ppt

bindings.command: resize grow width 10 px or 10 ppt
bindings.original_line: bindsym Right resize grow width 10 px or 10 ppt
bindsym l exec --no-startup-id i3lock-fancy || i3lock -c 000000, mode "default"
bindsym s exec --no-startup-id systemctl suspend, mode "default"
bindsym u exec --no-startup-id dm-tool switch-to-greeter, mode "default"
bindsym e exec --no-startup-id i3-msg exit, mode "default"
bindsym h exec --no-startup-id systemctl hibernate, mode "default"
bindsym r exec --no-startup-id systemctl reboot, mode "default"
bindsym Shift+s exec --no-startup-id systemctl poweroff, mode "default"

bindings.command: exec "i3-nagbar -t warning -m 'You pressed the exit shortcut. Do you really want to exit i3? This will end your X session.' -B 'Yes, exit i3' 'i3-msg exit'"
bindings.original_line: bindsym $mod+Shift+e exec "i3-nagbar -t warning -m 'You pressed the exit shortcut. Do you really want to exit i3? This will end your X session.' -B 'Yes, exit i3' 'i3-msg exit'"
